name: Lillypad Lowdown
description:
There are 10 stages in the current game. After each stage, you get a time bonus based on how well you did during the stage. New enemies start to appear and more enemies start to spawn. Get ready!

One of the main mechanics is Diving. The player can press Space to dive underwater, which prevents projectiles and enemies from damaging you.

Left-Click to use your Tongue. Your Tongue is your attack, and it is used to collect items, kill enemies, and more!

Press Escape to access the pause menu in-game. This lets you change the volume and take a breather.

Best Experience

For the best experience, install the game to your computer with a size of just 5 megabytes!

Development Team:

Developer/Programmer: Riptide

Artists: Nebora, Ivess, Riptide

Composer: Jonah Louque

Discord/Community:

This game was tested during development by discord members! Come join us on discord Here for early access!
